## SigninAPI.postSignin() method

Exchange basic auth credentials for session. See [https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/\#operation/PostSignin](https://v2.docs.influxdata.com/v2.0/api/#operation/PostSignin)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```
